an5.54:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jiṇṇo hoti jarāyābhibhūto.
an5.54:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu byādhito hoti byādhinābhibhūto.
an5.54:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, dubbhikkhaṁ hoti dussassaṁ dullabhapiṇḍaṁ, na sukaraṁ uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ.
an5.54:4.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhayaṁ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo, cakkasamārūḷhā jānapadā pariyāyanti.
an5.54:5.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅgho bhinno hoti.
an5.54:5.2: Saṅghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne aññamaññaṁ akkosā ca honti, aññamaññaṁ paribhāsā ca honti, aññamaññaṁ parikkhepā ca honti, aññamaññaṁ pariccajā ca honti.
an5.54:5.3: Tattha appasannā ceva nappasīdanti, pasannānañca ekaccānaṁ aññathattaṁ hoti.
an5.54:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca asamayā padhānāyāti.
an5.54:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu daharo hoti yuvā susu kāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā.
an5.54:7.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appābādho hoti appātaṅko, samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya.
an5.54:8.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, subhikkhaṁ hoti susassaṁ sulabhapiṇḍaṁ, sukaraṁ uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ.
an5.54:9.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, manussā samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti.
an5.54:10.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅgho samaggo sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharati.
an5.54:10.2: Saṅghe kho pana, bhikkhave, samagge na ceva aññamaññaṁ akkosā honti, na ca aññamaññaṁ paribhāsā honti, na ca aññamaññaṁ parikkhepā honti, na ca aññamaññaṁ pariccajā honti.
an5.54:10.3: Tattha appasannā ceva pasīdanti, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvo hoti.
an5.54:10.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca samayā padhānāyā”ti.
